languages.text: {n}Свирепо нахмурившись, Соломон качает головой.{/n} "Я признаю свою вину. Я оскорбил вас ложью и готов понести наказание". {n}Он достает из-за пояса внушительную шипованную булаву и протягивает вам.{/n} "Отплатите мне болью за боль".

{n}Frowning severely, Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I admit my guilt. I insulted you with lies, and I am ready to be punished." {n}He pulls an impressive spiked maul from his belt and holds it out to you.{/n} "Exact your vengeance in kind. Pain for pain."
languages.original_text: {n}Свирепо нахмурившись, Соломон качает головой.{/n} "Я признаю свою вину. Я оскорбил вас ложью и готов понести наказание". {n}Он достает из-за пояса внушительную шипованную булаву и протягивает вам.{/n} "Отплатите мне болью за боль".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne secoue la tête en fronçant sévèrement les sourcils.{/n} « Je reconnais ma faute. Je vous ai {mf|insulté|insultée} en vous mentant et je suis prêt à recevoir ma sanction. » {n}Il détache une impressionnante masse à pointes de sa ceinture et vous la tend.{/n} « Œil pour œil, dent pour dent. Rendez-moi la douleur que je vous ai causée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning severely, Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I admit my guilt. I insulted you with lies, and I am ready to be punished." {n}He pulls an impressive spiked maul from his belt and holds it out to you.{/n} "Exact your vengeance in kind. Pain for pain."

Je vous ai {mf|insulté|insultée} en vous mentant et je suis prêt à recevoir ma sanction. » {n}Il détache une impressionnante masse à pointes de sa ceinture et vous la tend.{/n} « Œil pour œil, dent pour dent. Rendez-moi la douleur que je vous ai causée. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは深刻な表情で眉をひそめ、首を横に振った。{/n}「罪を認めます。あなたに嘘をついて侮辱しました。その罰を受ける覚悟はできています」{n}彼は腰から威圧感のある棘付きのモールを引き抜き、あなたに差し出した。{/n}「同じやり方で報復してください。痛みには痛みを」
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning severely, Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I admit my guilt. I insulted you with lies, and I am ready to be punished." {n}He pulls an impressive spiked maul from his belt and holds it out to you.{/n} "Exact your vengeance in kind. Pain for pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは深刻な表情で眉をひそめ、首を横に振った。{/n}「罪を認めます。あなたに嘘をついて侮辱しました。その罰を受ける覚悟はできています」{n}彼は腰から威圧感のある棘付きのモールを引き抜き、あなたに差し出した。{/n}「同じやり方で報復してください。痛みには痛みを」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne frunce el ceño y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Admito mi culpa. Mis mentiras son un insulto hacia usted y estoy dispuesto a aceptar mi castigo». {n}Saca una imponente maza espinosa de su cinturón y te la entrega.{/n} «Ejecute su venganza. Dolor por dolor».
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning severely, Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I admit my guilt. I insulted you with lies, and I am ready to be punished." {n}He pulls an impressive spiked maul from his belt and holds it out to you.{/n} "Exact your vengeance in kind. Pain for pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne frunce el ceño y niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Admito mi culpa. Mis mentiras son un insulto hacia usted y estoy dispuesto a aceptar mi castigo». {n}Saca una imponente maza espinosa de su cinturón y te la entrega.{/n} «Ejecute su venganza. Dolor por dolor».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙皱紧了眉头，摇了摇头。{/n}“我承认我有罪。我用谎言侮辱了你，我愿意接受惩罚。”{n}他从腰间抽出了满是尖刺的战锤，看起来异常可怖，递给了你。{/n}“来报复我吧，以牙还牙。”
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning severely, Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I admit my guilt. I insulted you with lies, and I am ready to be punished." {n}He pulls an impressive spiked maul from his belt and holds it out to you.{/n} "Exact your vengeance in kind. Pain for pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙皱紧了眉头，摇了摇头。{/n}“我承认我有罪。我用谎言侮辱了你，我愿意接受惩罚。”{n}他从腰间抽出了满是尖刺的战锤，看起来异常可怖，递给了你。{/n}“来报复我吧，以牙还牙。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, kaşlarını çatarak başını sallıyor.{/n} "Suçumu kabul ediyorum. Yalanlarımla size hakaret ettim, cezama razıyım." {n}Kemerinden etkileyici bir çivili tokmak çıkarıp sana uzatıyor.{/n} "İntikam hakkınızdır. Göze göz, dişe diş."
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning severely, Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I admit my guilt. I insulted you with lies, and I am ready to be punished." {n}He pulls an impressive spiked maul from his belt and holds it out to you.{/n} "Exact your vengeance in kind. Pain for pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, kaşlarını çatarak başını sallıyor.{/n} "Suçumu kabul ediyorum. Size yalanlarımla hakaret ettim ve cezama razıyım." {n}Kemerinden etkileyici bir çivili tokmak çıkarıp sana uzatıyor.{/n} "İntikam, hakkınızdır. Göze göz, dişe diş."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schüttelt mit gerunzelter Stirn den Kopf.{/n} "Ich gestehe meine Schuld. Ich habe Euch mit Lügen beleidigt und bin bereit für meine Bestrafung." {n}Er zieht einen mit Stacheln besetzten Hammer aus seinem Gürtel und reicht ihn dir.{/n} "Rächt Euch mit gleicher Münze. Schmerz für Schmerz."
languages.original_text: {n}Frowning severely, Solomorne shakes his head.{/n} "I admit my guilt. I insulted you with lies, and I am ready to be punished." {n}He pulls an impressive spiked maul from his belt and holds it out to you.{/n} "Exact your vengeance in kind. Pain for pain."

Ich habe Euch mit Lügen beleidigt und bin bereit für meine Bestrafung." {n}Er zieht einen mit Stacheln besetzten Hammer aus seinem Gürtel und reicht ihn dir.{/n} "Rächt Euch mit gleicher Münze. Schmerz für Schmerz."
